node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `registry` ( `registry_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `question` mediumtext, `public` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `input_style` char(16) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`registry_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: registry
